resources:
DuckDuckGo App for Windows Get early access to try DuckDuckGo for Windows! DuckDuckGo for Windows has what you need to browse with more privacy — private search, tracker blocking, forced encryption, and cookie pop-up blocking, plus more best-in-class protections on the way. Looking for the Mac Version? Join the Private Waitlist An error happened while joining the Waitlist, please try again later You won\'t need to share any personal information to join the waitlist. You\'ll secure your place in line with a timestamp that exists solely on your device so we can notify you when it\'s your turn. You\'re on the list! We\'ll send you a notification when your copy of DuckDuckGo for Windows is ready to download. Your invite to try DuckDuckGo for Windows will arrive here. Check back soon, or we can send you a notification when it\'s your turn. Waitlist invites Start testing DuckDuckGo for Windows! Open your invite You\'re invited! Invite Code` Ready to use DuckDuckGo on Windows?\n\nStep 1\nVisit this URL on your Windows device to download:\nduckduckgo.com/windows\n\nStep 2\nOpen DuckDuckGo Installer in Downloads, select Install, then enter your invite code. Ready to use DuckDuckGo on Windows?

Step 1
Visit this URL on your Windows device to download:
https://duckduckgo.com/windows

Step 2
Open DuckDuckGo Installer in Downloads, select Install, then enter your invite code.

Invite Code: %s Invite copied to clipboard Code copied to clipboard Share your invite Know the instant you’re invited Get a notification when your copy of DuckDuckGo for Windows is ready for download.
